cast.overview: Between two Thanksgivings, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.
cast.title: Hannah and Her Sisters

details.biography:
Soon-Yi Previn is the adopted daughter of actress Mia Farrow and musician André Previn, and the wife of filmmaker Woody Allen. Soon-Yi Previn is notable for her relationship with Allen, who was her adoptive mother's boyfriend for over 10 years. Previn's relationship with Allen became national news in 1992.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Soon-Yi Previn, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Soon-Yi Previn
